title: Bug on custom mode poro king.
body:
Happy new year first. I wanna report a bug on custom mode of poro king. Last night my friend gather 10 people for fun custom matchup on poro king. But when we completed the waiting period. We 10 born at summoner's rift but still have the poro abilities {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:30}} and the poro toss counting bar. And we rapidly get all disconnected. Here is a photo for that situation. Will  I get some reward? (like skin XD).

ID: Liberty Walk (OCE)

replies.body: That's funny when we found ourselves at rift lol.
